permissions: Authenticated user who created the proffer like or an admin can delete a proffer like.
side_effects: Deletes the proffer like record, decrements the associated proffer like_count, and refreshes the proffer like user ID list.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (proffer like ID). --confirm must be set to delete.

flags.name: --confirm
flags.validation: Must be set to proceed. Example: --confirm
